biography.value: Hunchbacked and twisted, and has only one good eye. He is thoroughly wicked, strong, and remorseless.

description.value:
The Keeper makes two battleaxe attacks.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 3d8 + @mod + 1 type=slashing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 4d10 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a [[/save str 17 format=long]] or be knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

If a rock or similar object is hurled at the &Reference[giant]{giant}, the &Reference[giant]{giant} can, with a successful [[/save dex 10 format=long]], catch the missile and take no &Reference[bludgeoning]{bludgeoning} damage from it.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.
